addr: 1708 North Las Palmas Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90028
title: VIP Club Crawl Fridays in Hollywood with LA Epic Club Crawls
desc: Up to 5 Hollywood Hotspots, 5 Drinks/Shots, 5 VIP Entries, Pizza, & Party Games all in one Epic Club Crawl. Whether you're flying solo, partying with friends, or looking for a fun night out with your sweetheart, LA Epic Club Crawls will show you the best of Los Angeles nightlife in VIP style.Your professional party host will lead you and up to 200 people straight past those infamous Hollywood line-ups and straight into the nightclub with a drink or a shot in hand. It's the ultimate club hopping experience and best LA club crawl! Join LA Epic Club Crawls and be a true Hollywood VIP!
